entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
